---
title: "Jacob"
---

Jacob is a long-time community activist and anti-fascist who believes a better world is possible and aims to use his privilege to make lasting positive change.

### Countering Fascism

This workshop aims to define and situate the current iteration of fascism and discuss different avenues of resistance and what we can do together not only to stop fascism  from spreading, but also build resilient alternatives.
